paper_abstract: In this paper, we shall prove some properties of set-valued asymptotic martingale (amart for short) and provide an optional sampling theorem. We shall also prove a quasi-Riesz decomposition theorem for set-valued amarts. Finally we shall discuss the existence of selections of set-valued amarts and give a representation theorem of compact convex set-valued amarts. (C) 2007 Published by Elsevier Inc.
paper_title: Decomposition and representation theorem of set-valued amarts
